Eric Li

Carnegie Mellon University (2018-2022)

Mathematics, Computer Science

I'm Eric, a Mathematics and Computer Science student at Carnegie Mellon University, expecting to graduate in May 2022. In my free time, I like to watch sports and making spotify playlists. I'm looking for summer positions in software engineering and quantitative devlopment, so feel free to email me if you want to chat!

Currently, I'm the TA for 21-256 Multivariate Calculus. You can find my recitation notes in the teaching section of my website, which will be posted after every recitation.

This project is maintained by ericli. Contact me through Email or LinkedIn.
